sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment' function ResultOrders({ element }) { const { state, date, items, id } = element let totalPriceOrder = 0 return <>
  • Date: {date}
  • State: {state}
      • {items.map(element => { const { article , quantity} = element const {title, ref, price,id, img} = article let totalArticle = price * quantity totalPriceOrder += totalArticle return
      • Ref: {ref}
      • Article: {title}
      • Quantity: {quantity}
      • Price: {price}€ / TOTAL: {totalArticle}€
      }) }
  • TOTAL Order: {totalPriceOrder}€
} export default ResultOrders
